job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongOverviewstrongppbrppAs a member of our banking clients Data Science team youll be working on the machine learning pipelines that provide actionable intelligence that helps their bankers grow their books of business while working with an ever expanding number of clients The team aims to accomplish this goal with effective use of technology and data science techniques coupled with genuine curiosity and handson understanding of the business that we strive to facilitatenbspppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongppbrpp Produce intelligence eg predictive models reports dashboards to assist bankers with their clients needs Youll illuminate these needs through indepth study of the clients business with the bank and their interactions with the bankers You will also apply your intuition and relevant statistical techniques to make inferences and predictions from datapp Promote your work and supporting its adoption Youll be producing and interacting with a lot of artifacts communicated to bankers and executives on a regular basis as well as collecting feedback and providing governance once they are in production You will need to think critically about how your output is utilized by its audience Communicating results to stakeholders in a way that makes them useful will be contingent on your ability to appreciate and assimilate the bankers perspective Success in this regard means being a banker before being a data scientistpp Build out the banks data pipelines Much of the data is not big but it is messy and the engineering pipelines are often built concurrently with analysis Your data wrangling chops will be tested dailyppbrppstrongExperiencestrongppstrongspan classqlcursorspanstrongpp Gritpp Curiositypp Organizationpp Thoughtfulnesspp Strong statistical acumenpp Experience navigating tight deadlinespp Effective oral and written communicationpp A portfolio of selfdirected data projectspp A graduate degree in the physical sciencespp Several thousand hours of prior coding experiencepp Ability to identify the key deliverables for initially vague problem statementsppHandson experience with the following technologies would be very helpfulpp Gitpp Commandline interface on LinuxMacOSpp Databases eg SQL Server Snowflake MongoDBpp Python eg SciPy stack Statsmodels PySpark Tensorflowp
